Section.Title: Use in Cancer

ItemizedList.ListItem: Renal (kidney) toxicity. It is used to reduce the nephrotoxic effects caused by repeated treatment with cisplatin for advanced ovarian cancer.
Xerostomia (dry mouth). It is used to decrease dryness in the mouth caused by radiation therapy after surgery in some patients with head and neck cancer.

Section.Para: Amifostine is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.
